headline: Enphase Energy, Inc. (ENPH): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Enphase Energy, Inc. (ENPH) on The Finance Corner’s Substack by Kostadin Ristovski, ACCA. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ENPH. Enphase Energy, Inc. (ENPH)’s share was trading at $71.45 as of Dec 20th. ENPH’s trailing and forward P/E were 155.33 and 20.53 respectively according to Yahoo […]

headline: ENPH Investors Have Opportunity to Lead Enphase Energy, Inc. Securities Fraud Lawsuit with the Schall Law Firm
summary: NEW YORK, Dec. 23, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- The Schall Law Firm, a national shareholder rights litigation firm, reminds investors of a class action lawsuit against Enphase Energy, Inc.  for...
